tool_description: Extracts metadata tags from journal entry content including topics, people mentioned, locations, and activities.

entry_text.description: The journal entry text to analyze for metadata

extract_people.description: Whether to extract mentions of people's names

extract_activities.description: Whether to extract activity and event mentions

custom_tags.description: Custom tags to search for in the text

min_confidence.description: Minimum confidence score for extracted metadata (0.0-1.0)

error_messages: Empty entry text: Provide non-empty text content for metadata extraction.
Invalid confidence threshold: min_confidence must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Custom tags format error: Provide custom_tags as an array of strings.
usage: Provide entry_text for analysis. Enable/disable specific extraction types and set custom_tags for domain-specific metadata. Adjust min_confidence to control extraction sensitivity. Returns categorized metadata tags.

people_mentioned.description: Names of people mentioned in the entry

locations.description: Geographic locations referenced in the entry

activities.description: Activities and events mentioned in the entry

custom_matches.description: Custom tags found in the entry text
